    H

    handleBatteryDepletion() - Method in class CellarStealthSystem
    Handles the case, where player's battery depletes during the stealth sequence, recharging it automatically(if player owns Batteries) if possible, ending the game if not
    handleDefeat() - Method in class CombatSystem
    Used to handle the case of player being defeated in combat, giving him the choice to reload his last save(if one exists), or exit the game
    hasAmmo() - Method in class Weapon
    Decides whether the current weapon has ammo or not
    hasItem(String) - Method in class Player
    Checks whether a certain item is in the player's inventory
    heal(int) - Method in class Player
    Method used to heal the player when he chooses to in a fight
    healAmount - Variable in class HealingItem
    int value of how much health certain item adds to the person using it
    HealingItem - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class used to implement the healing items in the game
    HealingItem(String, String, int) - Constructor for class HealingItem
    Constructor, contains super from Item class
    HealingSerum - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class for the implementation of a HealingItem HealingSerum
    HealingSerum() - Constructor for class HealingSerum
    Constructor, contains super from HealingItem class
    health - Variable in class Character
    Int health value of the character
    HelpCommand - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class used to implement the Help command(Prints out all available commands player can use)
    HelpCommand() - Constructor for class HelpCommand
     
    hiddenItems - Variable in class SearchSpot
    List of items hidden inside the search spot
    Hint - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class used for implementing the Hint item type
    Hint(String, String) - Constructor for class Hint
    Constructor, contains super from Item class
